Title: The Tuner
Writer: Sergey Chetvertkov, Yevgeni Golubenko, A.F. Koshko (short stories), Kira Muratova
Actors: Georgiy Deliev, Alla Demidova, Renata Litvinova, Nina Ruslanova
Plot: A young piano tuner befriends two rich old-ladies, and plots, with the help of his girlfriend, to betray their trust and steal from them.
